post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returning tokens and user data. This endpoint uses a centralized error handler.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., Validation Error, Invalid JSON)

500.description: Internal Server Error (e.g., Database connection issue)

post.description: Logs out the current user by invalidating their session/token. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., Validation Error, Invalid JSON)

500.description: Internal Server Error (e.g., Database connection issue)

get.description: Fetches the profile details of the currently authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.
Fetches the details of a single menu permission by its unique ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid ID)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated and searchable list of permissions (e.g., read, create) for a specific menu ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid Menu ID)

500.description: Internal Server Error (Query parsing or service failure)

post.description: Adds a new permission (e.g., 'read', 'create') to a specific menu by its ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid Menu ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

put.description: Updates an existing menu permission (e.g., 'code', 'action_name') by its unique ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

delete.description: Deletes a specific permission from a menu by its unique permission ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid ID)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated and searchable list of all menus in the system.

parameters.description: Search term for name, description, or URL
parameters.name: search

400.description: Invalid query parameters

post.description: Adds a new menu item to the system. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid JSON or Validation Error)

get.description: Retrieves a list of all root-level menus (menus without a parent), typically for use in a dropdown. Requires Bearer token.

put.description: Updates the sort order of menus using drag-and-drop. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid JSON or Validation Error)

get.description: Retrieves the menu list specifically for the authenticated user, filtered by their 'read' permissions and formatted in a nested tree structure for the sidebar.

put.description: Updates an existing menu item by its ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid Menu ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

delete.description: Updates an existing menu item by its ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid Menu ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated and searchable list of all roles. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Invalid query parameters

post.description: Creates a new role. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid JSON or Validation Error)

get.description: Retrieves all menu permissions associated with a specific role. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Invalid Role ID

put.description: Updates menu permission assigned to a specific role. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

404.description: Role ID or Menu Permission not found

get.description: Fetches the details of a single role by its ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid Role ID)

put.description: Updates an existing role by its ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

delete.description: Deletes a role by its ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid Role ID)

get.description: Fetches the profile details of the currently authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.

put.description: Updates a user's profile details by their ID. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Bad Request (Invalid ID, Invalid JSON, or Validation Error)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer {your token}" into the field below.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
